page.title: 07Church Construction CONT
page.content:
16th Century The Church was allowed to{fall into {ruins}during this time as the patrons were Roman Catholics.
17th Century In this century the church was very {badly damaged.}In{1697}a{sun dial}was added to the porch.
Church Life
In the reign of{Queen Victoria}the church life was at a{very low ebb.}The Church had fallen into{disrepair.}The bell was replaced in{1848}and other {restoration work}carried out. The chancel arch was{rebuilt. Later in the reign of{George V,}there evolved a different scene to that of earlier years.
